verbs.description: essentialize (third-person singular simple present essentializes, present participle essentializing, simple past and past participle essentialized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To misrepresent (something) by oversimplifying a summary of its essence.
(transitive) To misrepresent (a characteristic of something) by falsely portraying it as essential to the whole (that is, implying that it defines the whole's essence).
examples: to essentialize race by stereotyping "what Whites do" or "how Blacks think"
